name: Translation for Business and Professional Needs
description: Practice in translating commercial, professional and technical texts. Students will have the opportunity to widen their knowledge of the vocabulary and structures particular to the language of business as well as to such fields as industrial relations, insurance, software, health care, social work and finance.
prerequisites: [FREB01H3 and FREB02H3] and [FREB08H3 or (FREB09H3)] or equivalent.
exclusions: FREC18H3 may not be taken after or concurrently with FRE480Y or FRE481Y.
